articles.title: Lynching Will Now Be A Hate Crime In US Under Biden's New Law
articles.description: US President Joe Biden on Tuesday signed into law a bill finally making racist lynchings a federal hate crime, ending more than a century of delays in outlawing the symbol of what he called "pure terror."
articles.content:
Joe Biden warned that racial hate isn't an old problem, but a persistent problem.
